channel.title: 2 questions one about waepon equip second about new way of duping
channel.description:
hi,
i fixed the duping problem (fast declene) but now i would ask can anyone make it when u accept trade its safes, so if peeps accet and loggg fast out they both got the item (duping)
second. there is a glitch peeps use dds special and change fast to ags so the ags hits and not the dds its it possible to fix that?
thank you ,
